knimeNode.name: XLS Control Table Merger
knimeNode.shortDescription: The XLS Control Table Merger merges two control tables together. You can either overwrite or append to the information from the first control table.

fullDescription.intro: The XLS Control Table Merger merges two control tables together. You can either overwrite or append to the information from the first control table.

option.name: how to combine second with first table

fullDescription.option: Either overwrite or append to the information from the first control table with the information from the second control table.

ports.inPort: XLS Control Table (holding tags used to select cells to be formatted by many XLS Formatting nodes).
XLS Control Table (holding tags used to select cells to be formatted by many XLS Formatting nodes).
ports.outPort: XLS Control Table (holding tags used to select cells to be formatted by many XLS Formatting nodes).
